subject: Re: I'm just curious..where do you conduct your Ghost box sessions?
author: draiga1
full_text:
Usually in my home since I don't go on alot of inveastigations. I do take it on investigations when I go on any though. 

I did one session in my car because a coworker wanted to contact her friend who had committed suicide. I haven't shared those files because she wants to keep it private, but we did get some good communication that night, and things were said that didn't make sense to me, but meant something to her.

I try to do a session every other day, but have fallen behind a bit due to heavy holiday work load. 

~Draiga
